filename: This I believe (The creed) in D
title: This I Believe (The Creed)
lyrics: This I Believe (The Creed)
Ben Fielding | Matt Crocker
VERSE 1
Our Father ever - last - ing the all creat - ing One
God Al - mighty
Through Your Holy Spir - it conceiving Christ the Son
Jesus our Saviour
CHORUS 1
I believe in God our Father I believe in Christ the Son
I believe in the Holy Spirit our God is three in One
I believe in the resur - rection that we will rise a - gain
For I believe in the Name of Jesus
INSTRUMENTAL
VERSE 2
Our judge and our de - fend - er suffered and cru - cified
Forgiveness is in You
Descended into dark - ness You rose in glo - rious life
Forever seat - ed high
BRIDGE
I be - lieve in You
I be - lieve You rose a - gain
I be - lieve that Jesus Christ is Lord
CHORUS 2
I believe in life e - ternal I believe in the virgin birth
I believe in the saints' communion and in Your holy Church
I believe in the resur - rection when Jesus comes a - gain
For I believe in the Name of Jesus
ENDING
For I believe in the Name of Jesus

This I Believe (The Creed)
Ben Fielding | Matt Crocker
Key - D | Tempo - 72 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
G Bm A D/F#
Our Father ever - last - ing the all creat - ing One
G Bm A D/F#
God Al - mighty
G Bm A D/F#
Through Your Holy Spir - it conceiving Christ the Son
G A
Jesus our Saviour
CHORUS 1
D Em G A
I believe in God our Father I believe in Christ the Son
Bm G
I believe in the Holy Spirit our God is three in One
D Em G A
I believe in the resur - rection that we will rise a - gain
Bm G A (D) (Br / Ch2)
For I believe in the Name of Jesus
INSTRUMENTAL
| G Bm | A D/F# | G Bm | A D/F# |
VERSE 2
G Bm A D/F#
Our judge and our de - fend - er suffered and cru - cified
G Bm A D/F#
Forgiveness is in You
G Bm A D/F#
Descended into dark - ness You rose in glo - rious life
G A
Forever seat - ed high

G Bm A D/F#
I be - lieve in You
G Bm A D/F#
I be - lieve You rose a - gain
G Bm A D
I be - lieve that Jesus Christ is Lord

D Em G A
I believe in life e - ternal I believe in the virgin birth
Bm G
I believe in the saints' communion and in Your holy Church
D Em G A
I believe in the resur - rection when Jesus comes a - gain
Bm G A D (To Ch 1)
For I believe in the Name of Jesus
ENDING
Bm G A D
For I believe in the Name of Jesus
